text: If you are reproached for the name of Christ, you are blessed, because the Spirit of 4:14 glory 71.5% ¦ glory and of power ANT 15.7%glory and of God 4:14 rests ¦ has come to rest PCKrests upon you. 4:14 On their part he is blasphemed, but on your part he is glorified. ¦ --- CTOn their part he is blasphemed, but on your part he is glorified.
